title: Apache EventMesh
snippet: Apache EventMesh is a dynamic event-driven application runtime used to decouple the application and backend middleware layer, which supports a wide range of use cases.

title: EventMesh GitHub Repository
snippet: EventMesh is a dynamic cloud-native eventing infrastructure used to decouple the application and backend middleware layer.

title: EventMesh Documentation
snippet: Comprehensive documentation for Apache EventMesh including getting started guides, tutorials, and API references.
